content.query:
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS dbo.vw_history_historicalpaymentcardaccount
GO

CREATE VIEW dbo.vw_history_historicalpaymentcardaccount
AS
SELECT DISTINCT
    --ext.[id],
    --ext.[created],
    --ext.[change_type],
    --ext.[instance_id],
    --ext.[channel],
    --ext.[user_id],
    --ext.[body],
    --ext.[change_details],
    --ext.*,
    js.[id],
    js.[name_on_card],
    js.[start_month],
    js.[start_year],
    js.[expiry_month],
    js.[expiry_year],
    js.[status],
    js.[created],
    js.[updated],
    js.[issuer_id],
    js.[payment_card_id],
    js.[token],
    js.[country],
    js.[currency_code],
    js.[pan_end],
    js.[pan_start],
    js.[is_deleted],
    js.[fingerprint]
 FROM [dbo].[ext_history_historicalpaymentcardaccount] ext
OUTER APPLY OPENJSON (JSON_QUERY(Body, '$'))
   WITH (
        [id] int '$.id',
        [name_on_card] varchar(150) '$.name_on_card',
        [start_month] int '$.start_month',
        [start_year] int '$.start_year',
        [expiry_month] int '$.expiry_month',
        [expiry_year] int '$.expiry_year',
        [status] int '$.status',
        [order] int '$.order',
        [created] varchar(32) '$.created',
        [updated] varchar(32) '$.updated',
        [issuer_id] int '$.issuer',
        [payment_card_id] int '$.payment_card',
        [token] varchar(255) '$.token',
        [country] varchar(40) '$.country',
        [currency_code] varchar(3) '$.currency_code',
        [pan_end] varchar(4) '$.pan_end',
        [pan_start] varchar(4) '$.pan_start',
        [is_deleted] bit '$.is_deleted',
        [fingerprint] varchar(100) '$.fingerprint',
        [psp_token] varchar(255) '$.psp_token',
        [consents] varchar(4000) '$.consents',
        [hash] varchar(255) '$.hash'
   ) AS js
--WHERE ext.[created] >= dateadd(day,datediff(day,1,GETDATE()),0)
--   AND ext.[created] < dateadd(day,datediff(day,0,GETDATE()),0)
